Summary Learning never stops for me - we don't know what we don't know. My stand is to continue discover the unknown and in the process, make a difference in people's lives as long as I'm here. 
 
I have proven leadership and management skills in the manufacturing and service industries, work effectively across diverse cultures and am comfortable in a multinational environment. I have direct experience in setting up a major manufacturing start-up operation in China.  
 
Specialties: Manufacturing and Operations Management, Environmental, Health & Safety, Industrial Engineering, Project Management, Mfg. Summary I am passionate about keeping up on the leading thoughts and trends across multiple disciplines: Lean methods, Organizational Behavior & Management, Strategic Thinking & Planning, Innovation Processes, User-Centered Design, Data Visualization, Analytics, and Persuasive Communications. Outside of work, I'm passionate about promoting VEX and FIRST Robotics programs for kids at all levels. I actively support the Boy Scouts of America as an Assistant Scoutmaster and Merit Badge Counselor.
